name: Candy Land (itch) (Gabriel Spytkowski)
description:
Hello!

Candy Land is a sweet top-down view 2D game where you will play as a marshmallow-rambo killing jellies and demonic cookies in order to get to and defeat the Candy King!

This is a prototype of a game that we made as a group project for our assignment in 1st year of our course. I was taking part in gameplay programming.

Enjoy!

Controls:

WSAD - Move the character

Arrows - Attack in the desired direction

E - Interact / Pick up a gun

1 - Equip/unequip a lollipop

2 - Equip/unequip a gun

Enter - save/load game
